mapper.select: select aptCode, apartmentName, lng, lat from houseinfo where dongCode = #{regcode}
select dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor from housedeal where aptCode = #{regcode}

select apt_name, apt_floor, apt_area, apt_dong, apt_amount, noo from ( select info.apartmentName apt_name, deal.floor apt_floor, deal.area apt_area, info.dong apt_dong, deal.dealAmount apt_amount, info.lng apt_lng, info.lat apt_lat, deal.no noo from houseinfo info join housedeal deal on info.aptCode = deal.aptCode) tmp where noo in (select aptCode from interestarea where user_id = #{userId})
